info.title: Bump into the bottom edge of a Nested modal dialog

raw.name: VoiceOver for macOS
raw.defaultConfigurationInstructionsHTML: Configure VoiceOver with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.

instructions: If VoiceOver said 'quick nav off', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'quick nav on', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back off.
If VoiceOver said 'arrow quick key nav off', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'arrow quick key nav on', press <kbd>Left Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Right Arrow</kbd> again to turn it back off.
If VoiceOver said 'single quick key nav off', press <kbd>Control</kbd>+<kbd>Option</kbd>+<kbd>q</kbd> again to turn it back on.
If VoiceOver said 'single quick key nav on', press <kbd>Control</kbd>+<kbd>Option</kbd>+<kbd>q</kbd> again to turn it back off.

setupScript.scriptDescription: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' dialog followed by the 'Address Added' dialog, and sets focus on the 'OK' button inside the second dialog
setupScript.name: openAddressAddedDialogAndFocusOKButton

instructions.instructions: Starting at the 'OK' button inside the nested dialog, make multiple attempts to navigate past the bottom edge

defaultMode: Configure VoiceOver with default settings. For help, read <a href="https://github.com/w3c/aria-at/wiki/Configuring-Screen-Readers-for-Testing">Configuring Screen Readers for Testing</a>.

commands.keystroke: Control+Option+Right Arrow then Control+Option+Right Arrow then Control+Option+F3

assertions.assertionStatement: Screen reader cursor is positioned at 'OK' button
assertions.assertionPhrase: position screen reader cursor at 'OK' button

tokenizedAssertionStatements.jaws: The virtual cursor is positioned at 'OK' button
tokenizedAssertionStatements.nvda: The browse mode caret is positioned at 'OK' button
tokenizedAssertionStatements.voiceover_macos: The VoiceOver cursor is positioned at 'OK' button

tokenizedAssertionPhrases.jaws: position the virtual cursor at 'OK' button
tokenizedAssertionPhrases.nvda: position the browse mode caret at 'OK' button
tokenizedAssertionPhrases.voiceover_macos: position the VoiceOver cursor at 'OK' button
